devdoc.author: PoolTogether Inc Team
devdoc.details: This contract is only keeping track of the rewards. Reward tokens are actually stored in the TokenVault contract.

params.stakerCut: Percentage of rewards that goes to stakers

params.gauge: Address of the gauge for which the reward token is added
params.timestamp: Timestamp at which the reward token was pushed
params.token: Address of the token being pushed

params.amount: Amount of tokens sent to the vault
params.exchangeRate: New exchange rate for this `token` in this `gauge`
params.gauge: Address of the gauge for which tokens were added
params.stakerRewards: Amount of rewards allocated to stakers
params.token: Address of the token sent to the vault

params.exchangeRate: Exchange rate at which the rewards were claimed
params.gauge: Address of the gauge for which the user claimed rewards
params.token: Address of the token for which the user claimed rewards
params.user: Address of the user for which the rewards were claimed

params.caller: Address who called the redeem function
params.token: Address of the token for which the user redeemed rewards
params.user: Address of the user for which the rewards were redeemed

params.gauge: Address of the gauge to decrease stake for
params.oldStakeBalance: Old stake balance of the user
params.user: Address of the user to decrease stake for

params.gauge: Address of the gauge to increase stake for
params.oldStakeBalance: Old stake balance of the user
params.user: Address of the user to increase stake for

afterSwap(address,address,uint256,addres.details: Called by the liquidator contract anytime tokens are liquidated.Will push `token` to the `gaugeRewardTokens` mapping if different from the current one.

params._ticket: Address of the tickets that were sold
params._token: Address of the token that the tickets were sold for
params._tokenAmount: Amount of tokens that the tickets were sold for

params._gauge: Address of the gauge to claim rewards for
params._rewardToken: Reward token to claim rewards for
params._user: Address of the user to claim rewards for

params._gauge: Address of the gauge to claim rewards for
params._user: Address of the user to claim rewards for

params._stakerCut: Percentage of rewards that goes to stakers

params._gauge: Address of the gauge to get current reward token for

returns._0: Current reward token for the given gauge

params._gauge: Address of the gauge to get rewards for
params._rewardToken: Reward token to get rewards for
params._user: Address of the user to get rewards for

returns._0: Amount of rewards for the given gauge and token

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

redeem(address,address).details: Rewards can be redeemed on behalf of a user.

params._token: Address of the token to redeem rewards for
params._user: Address of the user to redeem rewards for

gaugeRewardTokenExchangeRates.details: gauge => reward token address => reward token timestamp => exchange rate

userGaugeRewardTokenExchangeRates.details: user => gauge => reward token address => reward token timestamp => exchange rate

userGaugeRewardTokenLastClaimedTimestamp.details: user => gauge => reward token address => timestamp

devdoc.title: PoolTogether V4 GaugeReward

Deployed(address,address,address,uint32).notice: Emitted when the contract is deployed

RewardTokenPushed(address,address,uint25.notice: Emitted when a new reward token is pushed onto the `gaugeRewardTokens` mapping

RewardsAdded(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when tickets are swapped for tokens

RewardsClaimed(address,address,address,u.notice: Emitted when a user claimed their rewards for a given gauge and token

RewardsRedeemed(address,address,address,.notice: Emitted when a user redeemed their rewards for a given token

afterDecreaseGauge(address,address,uint2.notice: Callback function to call in GaugeController after a user has decreased his gauge stake.

afterIncreaseGauge(address,address,uint2.notice: Fallback function to call in GaugeController after a user has increased their gauge stake.Callback function to call in GaugeController after a user has increased their gauge stake.

afterSwap(address,address,uint256,addres.notice: Records exchange rate after swapping an amount of `ticket` for `token`.

claim(address,(address,uint64),address).notice: Claim user rewards for a given gauge and reward token.

claimAll(address,address).notice: Claim all user rewards for a given gauge.

currentRewardToken(address).notice: Return the current reward token for the given gauge.

gaugeRewardTokenExchangeRates(address,ad.notice: Tracks reward token exchange rates per gauge

getRewards(address,(address,uint64),addr.notice: Get user rewards for a given gauge and token.

liquidator().notice: Address of the liquidator that this contract is listening to

redeem(address,address).notice: Redeem user rewards for a given token.

stakerCut().notice: Percentage of rewards that goes to stakers. Fixed point 9 number that is less than 1.

userGaugeRewardTokenExchangeRates(addres.notice: Tracks reward token exchange rate per user and gauge

userGaugeRewardTokenLastClaimedTimestamp.notice: Tracks user last claimed timestamp per gauge and reward token

userdoc.notice: The GaugeReward contract handles rewards for users who staked in one or several gauges on the GaugeController contract.

t_mapping(t_address,t_mapping(t_address,.label: mapping(address => mapping(address => mapping(contract IERC20 => mapping(uint64 => uint256))))
